kb3.name: kb3_items_destroyed
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_items_destroyed` ( `itd_kll_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `itd_itm_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `itd_quantity` int(11) NOT NULL default '1', `itd_itl_id` smallint(11) NOT NULL default '0', `itd_singleton` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', KEY `itd_kll_id` (`itd_kll_id`), KEY `itd_itl_id` (`itd_itl_id`,`itd_kll_id`,`itd_itm_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
